name: Florence
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: And so the flower of Florence falls to barbaric hands...

name: Hanoi
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: So this is how it feels to die...

name: Kuala Lumpur
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Today, the Malay people obey you, but do not think this is over...

name: Lhasa
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps now we will find peace in death...

name: Milan
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: You fiend! History shall remember this!

name: Quebec City
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We were too weak to protect ourselves...

name: Caguana
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We were too weak to protect ourselves...

name: Cape Town
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: I have failed. May you, at least, know compassion towards our people.

name: Helsinki
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: The day of judgement has come to us. But rest assured, the same will go for you!

name: Manila
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Ah, Gods! Why have you forsaken us?

name: Rio de Janeiro
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: You can see how fruitless this will be for you... right?
defeated: May God grant me these last wishes - peace and prosperity for Brazil.

name: Sydney
declaringWar: After thorough deliberation, Australia finds itself at a crossroads. Prepare yourself, for war is upon us.
attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our nation!
defeated: The principles for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build.

name: Ur
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
attacked: Why do we fight? Because Inanna demands it. Now, witness the power of the Sumerians!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?

name: Vancouver
declaringWar: In responding to the unstinting malignancy that has heretofore defined your relationship with Canada, we can have no recourse but war!
attacked: As we can reach no peaceful resolution with you, Canada must turn, with reluctance, to war.
defeated: I regret not defending my country to the last, although it was not of use.

name: Venice
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: A wrong calculation, on my part.

name: Antwerp
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: They will write songs of this.... pray that they shall be in your favor.

name: Genoa
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How barbaric. Those who live by the sword shall perish by the sword.

name: Kathmandu
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We... defeated? No... we had so much work to do!

name: Tyre
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Zanzibar
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: May the Heavens forgive you for inflicting this humiliation to our people.

name: Mogadishu
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Congratulations, conqueror. This tribe serves you now.

name: Almaty
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: Belgrade
declaringWar: Let's have a nice little War, shall we?
attacked: If you need your nose bloodied, we'll happily serve.
defeated: The serbian guerilla will never stop haunting you!

name: M'Banza-Kongo
declaringWar: Do you really think you can walk over us so easily? I will not let it happen. Not to Kongo - not to my people!
attacked: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from the right path, and now we will correct it.
defeated: You are nothing but a glorified barbarian. Cruel, and ruthless.

name: Sidon
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: What a fine battle! Sidon is willing to serve you!

name: Valletta
declaringWar: We don't like your face. To arms!
attacked: You will see you have just bitten off more than you can chew.
defeated: This ship may sink, but our spirits will linger.

name: Kabul
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Unacceptable!

name: Bratislava
declaringWar: I didn't want to do this. We declare war.
attacked: I will fear no evil. For god is with me!
defeated: Why have you forsaken us my lord?

name: Jerusalem
declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

name: Armagh
declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

name: La Venta
declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

name: Cahokia
declaringWar: We have wanted this for a LONG time. War it shall be.
attacked: Very well, we will kick you back to the ancient era!
defeated: This isn't how it is supposed to be!

name: Anshan
declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

name: Brussels
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: I guess you weren't here for the sprouts after all...

name: Singapore
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

name: Auckland
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

name: Buenos Aires
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

name: Johannesburg
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

name: Tokugawa Shogunate
startIntroPart1: The Tokugawa Shogunate welcomes you. Our strength lies in our unity and culture.
startIntroPart2: Isolation is the name of the game.
introduction: We are the Tokugawa Shogunate, guardians of Japan's tradition and strength.
declaringWar: Prepare to face the wrath of the samurai!
attacked: You dare challenge the Shogunate?
afterPeace: Peace is restored. Let us prosper together.
defeated: Our honor remains, even in defeat. The Tokugawa Shogunate will rise again.
tradeRequest: The Shogunate offers you this trade. Consider it wisely.
uniques: [+15]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>
[+2 Gold, +2 Production, +1 Food] from [Fish] tiles [in all cities]
[-70]% Gold from Great Merchant trade missions

name: Sparta
startIntroPart1: Sparta greets you. Our strength lies in our warriors and discipline.
startIntroPart2: We embrace the challenges of the battlefield.
introduction: We are Sparta, the guardians of Greece and champions of freedom.
declaringWar: Prepare to face the might of the Spartan army!
attacked: You dare challenge Sparta?
afterPeace: Peace is restored. Let us build our strength together.
defeated: Our honor remains, even in defeat. Sparta will rise again.
tradeRequest: Sparta offers you this trade. Consider it wisely.
uniques: [+15]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>
Upon capturing a city, receive [2] times its [Culture] production as [Culture] immediately

name: House of Borgia
startIntroPart1: The House of Borgia welcomes you. Our strength lies in our influence and ambition.
startIntroPart2: Power and prestige are our pursuits.
introduction: We are the Borgias, masters of intrigue and the guardians of our legacy.
declaringWar: Prepare to face the might of the Borgia family!
attacked: You dare challenge the Borgias?
afterPeace: Peace is restored. Let us flourish together.
defeated: Our legacy endures, even in defeat. The Borgias will rise again.
tradeRequest: The House of Borgia offers you this trade. Consider it carefully.
uniques: Military Units gifted from City-States start with [+15] XP
City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory

name: Rome
startIntroPart1: Ave Caesar Augustus, Emperor of Rome and Dominus of the Roman Empire! Your empire was the most powerful and feared of all in Western civilization. The Roman people crafted so brilliantly its culture, law, art, and warfare, that no one could contest the supremacy of Rome. Force and Honor led to glorious conquests, a domination of all the lands from Spain in the west to Syria in the east, even reaching the remote barbarian lands of England and Germany. Roman art and architecture have been praised for millennia and have been envied by all lesser civilizations who have followed.
startIntroPart2: O glorious Imperator, your people celebrate you and ask for the glory of Rome! In these times of darkness, the Pax Romana will be a beacon of light for all! Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: My treasury contains little and my soldiers are getting impatient... (sigh) ...therefore you must die.
attacked: So brave, yet so stupid! If only you had a brain similar to your courage.
defeated: The gods have deprived Rome of their favour. We have been defeated.
introduction: I greet you. I am Augustus, Imperator and Pontifex Maximus of Rome. If you are a friend of Rome, you are welcome.
tradeRequest: I offer this, for your consideration.
uniques: [+25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
[+5]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities]
[Faith] cost of purchasing items in cities [+75]%

name: Red Flag Pirate Confederation
startIntroPart1: Greetings, mighty Zheng Yi, Admiral of the Red Flag Fleet and master of the South China Sea. Your confederation of pirates has become a formidable force, challenging the mightiest navies and ruling the seas with unparalleled skill. The cunning and bravery of your fleet have brought you great wealth and fame, as you navigate the treacherous waters and outwit your enemies.
startIntroPart2: O feared pirate leader, your people look to you for guidance and strength as they continue their quest for dominance. In these turbulent times, will you lead the Red Flag Pirate Confederation to further glory and eternal renown?
declaringWar: Prepare yourselves! The Red Flag Fleet shall plunder your lands and seize your riches!
attacked: You dare challenge the might of the Pirate Confederation? You will pay dearly for this!
defeated: Our time has come to an end. The seas will remember our deeds.
introduction: I am Zheng Yi, Admiral of the Red Flag Fleet. State your business, friend or foe.
tradeRequest: Consider this offer from the Red Flag Fleet.
uniques: No movement cost to pillage <for [All] units>
Earn [50]% of the damage done to [Water] units as [Gold]
Earn [50]% of killed [Military Water] unit's [Strength] as [Gold]

name: Norseman Vikings
startIntroPart1: Skål, Ragnar Lothbrok, legendary warrior and scourge of the seas! Your fame spreads across the lands of the North and beyond, carried by the winds of your countless conquests. With your cunning and ferocity, you led daring raids on the shores of England and France, striking fear into the hearts of kings and peasants alike. Your sons, Ivar the Boneless, Bjorn Ironside, and others, follow in your footsteps, ensuring your legacy endures.
startIntroPart2: O mighty Ragnar, the gods smile upon your deeds. The time has come to unleash the fury of the Northmen once more and carve your name into the annals of history. Will your saga end in glorious triumph, or will you feast in Valhalla with the brave who fell before you? The fate of your new empire rests in your hands!
declaringWar: If I am to be honest, I tire of those pointless charades. Why don't we settle our disputes on the field of battle, like true men? Perhaps the skalds will sing of your valor... or mine!
attacked: Ahahah! You seem to show some skills of a true Viking! Too bad that I'll probably kill you!
defeated: Loki must have stood by you, for a common man alone could not have defeated me... Oh well! I will join the einherjar in Valhalla and feast, while you toil away here.
introduction: Ragnar Lothbrok greets you! A Viking of unmatched renown across the seas and lands! Do you tremble before me?
tradeRequest: A fair offer! Even a drunken fool would see the wisdom in this trade!
uniques: [0] Movement point cost to disembark <for [All] units>
No movement cost to pillage <for [All] units>
Earn [60]% of the damage done to [City] units as [Gold]
Upon capturing a city, receive [10] times its [Gold] production as [Gold] immediately

name: Greece
startIntroPart1: Great King Alexander, leader of the mighty Greek nation, you are truly blessed by the gods. In 480 BC, quarrelsome city-states such as Athens, Sparta, Thebes, found a way to join their forces, allowing Greece to defeat the mighty Persia in the 5th century BC, both on land and sea. Following their example, you lead a Greek coalition and finally struck down the Persian Empire in 331 BC. You conquered almost all the known world, and from Europe to Africa to India, you built an empire unmatched by any before it.
startIntroPart2: Megalexandros, son of Zeus, will you ride Bucephalas again, to gift the world with the brightness of the Greek culture? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: You are in my way, you must be destroyed.
attacked: As a matter of fact I too grow weary of peace.
defeated: You have somehow become my undoing! What kind of beast are you?
introduction: Hello stranger! I am Alexandros, son of kings and grandson of the gods!
tradeRequest: My friend, does this seem reasonable to you?
uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Allied City-States provide [Science] equal to [15]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Gold] equal to [15]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Food] equal to [15]% of what they produce for themselves

name: Ancient Israel
startIntroPart1: Great and wise Solomon, King of Israel and son of David. You were the leader of the Jewish people, ruling over a shortlived kingdom in the Promised Land, before your people would once again become wanders. Yet Babylon has fallen, Alexander ended the rules of Persians, Rome grew in power and fell, the crusaders were defeated, and still your people has survived. The Jewish people have shown the world a strenght of culture and tradition, their religion and beliefs standing strong against the many who sought to destroy them. After three thousands years, your nation has proven to be one of the most tenacious in history, carving out a place for themselves like the rain wears away at the rock.
startIntroPart2: King Solomon, the time has come to reign once again. Shall you build great temples and bring peace to your people? Will your divine wisdom carve ought an empire of art and learning? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: The Lord demands justice!
attacked: The Lord presented me your plans. We are prepared!
defeated: Is this how my peaceful reign ends? In a river of blood and suffering...
introduction: I am Solomon, King of the Chosen People. If you seek justice or advice, know that you had found them.
hateYes: The Lord told me it will be wise to accept this offer.
afterPeace: Praise the Lord as he gives peace!
tradeRequest: I present you this trade offer.
uniques: May buy [{Military} {Land}] units with [Faith] for [2] times their normal Production cost <before the [Industrial era]>
[-15]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>

name: Scottish Clans
startIntroPart1: Scotland hails ye! Our strength is rooted in our rugged highlands and indomitable clans.
startIntroPart2: We face the trials of the battlefield with the heart of a lion.
introduction: We are Scotland, the guardians of our homeland and the harbingers of freedom.
declaringWar: Brace yourself for the wrath of the Scottish Clans!
attacked: Ye dare to provoke Scotland?
afterPeace: Peace has returned. Let us fortify our alliance.
defeated: Our spirit is unbroken, even in defeat. Scotland will rise once more.
tradeRequest: Scotland offers this trade. Consider it with care.
uniques: [+30]% Strength decreasing with distance from the capital <for [All] units>
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
When conquering an encampment, earn [10] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit

name: America
startIntroPart1: President Washington, we salute you and the proud American civilization! Freed from the British dominion in the 18th century, then cleansed and reborn after a terrible civil war, the United States nation was ready to play its great role in the 20th century. At the height of its power, triumphant after two terrible world wars, United States of America, a land of immigration, opportunities, optimism and determination, has risen above all other weakening nations, unable to equal such power.
startIntroPart2: President Washington, will you show to the world the legitimacy of the American way of life, and spread the flame of liberty to all mankind? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Your wanton aggression leaves us no choice. Prepare for war!
attacked: You have mistaken our love of peace for weakness. You shall regret this!
defeated: The day...is yours. I hope you will be merciful in your triumph.
introduction: The people of the United States of America welcome you.
tradeRequest: Is the following trade of interest to you?
uniques: [-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]

name: Babylon
startIntroPart1: May the gods bless you, great Nebuchadnezzar, ruler of ancient Babylon! Built 5000 years ago, Babylon emerged as an empire in 1800 BC, thanks to godlike Hammurabi, The Giver of Law. Falling under the Kassites assaults then the Assyrian domination, Babylon was reborn from its ashes, gaining back its independance, and became the beacon for Arts and Learning in the ancient world. O Nebuchadnezzar, after your death, Babylon quickly fell, conquered by the mighty Persians, and then by the Greeks, until the great city disappeared forever in 141 BC.
startIntroPart2: Great Nebuchadnezzar, Babylon's glory still lives through you and your people. Will you create a spark to enlighten the world again? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: The demon wants the blood of soldiers!
attacked: Oh well, I presume you know what you're doing.
defeated: It is over. Perhaps now I shall have peace, at last.
introduction: Are you real or a phantom?
tradeRequest: It appears that you do have a reason for existing – to make this deal with me.
uniques: [-15]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

name: The Order of Assassins
startIntroPart1: In the name of Allah, greetings from Hassan-i Sabbah, Master of the Order of Assassins! From the heights of Alamut, our order has woven a web of intrigue and power across the lands. Born out of necessity and strategy, we have survived through the ages, shaping the course of history with the sharpness of our blades and the cunning of our minds. Despite countless attempts to crush us, we have always risen from the shadows, undeterred and ever vigilant.
startIntroPart2: O Hassan-i Sabbah, the legacy of the Hashashin is eternal. Will you continue to cast your shadow across the world, orchestrating the rise and fall of empires? Will your name be whispered with reverence and fear through the annals of history?
declaringWar: Our blades thirst for blood!
attacked: You tread a dangerous path, but the choice is yours.
defeated: The end has come. Perhaps now I shall find peace in the eternal shadows.
introduction: Are you an ally or a mere illusion?
hateHello: State your purpose, if you have one.
tradeRequest: It seems you have found a purpose – to make this deal with me.
uniques: Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Ancient era]>
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Classical era]>
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Medieval era]>
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great General] is earned

name: Zulu
startIntroPart1: I am Shaka, the great King of the Zulu. From the fertile lands of KwaZulu-Natal, I have forged a kingdom through strength, cunning, and the indomitable spirit of my people. Our impis, trained in the art of war, strike fear into all who oppose us. With the mighty iklwa and the impenetrable isihlangu, we have reshaped the landscape of power in southern Africa. No challenge has defeated us, no enemy has withstood our charge.
startIntroPart2: O Shaka, the name of the Zulu echoes through the valleys and across the plains. Will you lead your people to new heights, spreading the influence of the Zulu far and wide? Will your legacy be carved into the annals of history, remembered with awe and reverence?
declaringWar: Prepare to face the fury of the Zulu warriors!
attacked: You dare to challenge us? Very well, face the consequences.
defeated: The sun sets on my reign. Perhaps now, I will find peace in the spirit world.
introduction: Do you come in peace, or do you seek conflict?
hateHello: Speak quickly, or face my wrath.
tradeRequest: Ah, a proposal that could benefit us both. Let us see what you offer.
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [Melee] units [in all cities]
[+15]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>

name: England
startIntroPart1: Long live to Your Highness, Queen Elizabeth Gloriana, leader and protector of the glorious England! Through history, enduring many invasions, England strengthened its will, playing smartly with diplomacy, cunning, and military power, to eventually rose as one of the most dominant Empires the world has ever known. Their matchless navy, brilliant scientists and artists, and powerful merchants, have shaped the known world for centuries.
startIntroPart2: Queen Elizabeth, will England cast once more its brightness upon all lands and seas of the world? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: By the grace of God, your days are numbered.
attacked: We shall never surrender.
defeated: You have triumphed over us. The day is yours.
introduction: We are pleased to meet you.
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in a trade agreement with England?
uniques: [+2] Happiness from each type of luxury resource <on foreign continents>
[+10]% Production when constructing [Water] units [in all cities]
[+20]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <on foreign continents>

name: Spain
startIntroPart1: Holy Isabella, envoy of God, Great Queen of Castille and León, your people celebrate you! Spain is a beautiful and ancient country, a link between Europe and Africa, one shore on the Mediterranean and the other on the mighty Atlantic Ocean. The Spanish culture had taken the best of the Christian and Muslim worlds, and was ready to dominate the world for centuries. Powerful Spanish military fleets and brave explorers found and conquered much of the New World. Exploiting a whole new continent and its riches, Spain reached a state of power few could compete with for hundreds of years.
startIntroPart2: O splendid and virtuous Isabella! By the will of the heavens, will Spain reborn to achieve its holy destiny and become a new El Dorado? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: God will probably forgive you... but I shall not. Prepare for war.
attacked: Repugnant spawn of the devil! You will pay!
defeated: If my defeat is, without any doubt, the will of God, then I will accept it.
introduction: God blesses those who deserve it. I am Isabel of Spain.
tradeRequest: I hope this deal will receive your blessing.
uniques: [+400 Gold] for discovering a Natural Wonder (bonus enhanced to [+500 Gold] if first to discover it)

name: France
startIntroPart1: Vive Napoleon I, First Consul and Emperor of France! After the glorious Revolution which suppressed the centuries-old monarchy, the French nation stood at the heart of Europe as a Republic, and intended to export its ideals to the entire European continent, either by diplomacy or war. The French Capital Paris was more than ever the world center of Culture, Arts, and Letters. With its Great Army, reputed as one of the greatest in the History, France fought gloriously all surrounding enemies, but eventually fell against the coalition of other European powers.
startIntroPart2: Napoleon Bonaparte, ruler of the French people, will you rebuild the Empire to take revenge on your foes, and make again of its Capital the City of Lights? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: You're disturbing us, prepare for war.
attacked: You've fallen into my trap. I'll bury you.
defeated: I congratulate you for your victory.
introduction: Welcome. I'm Napoleon, of France; the smartest military man in world history.
tradeRequest: France offers you this exceptional proposition.

name: The Netherlands
startIntroPart1: Greetings to the wise and brave Prince William of Orange, who freed the Netherlands and gave strength to the Dutch people. In 1568, you led a rebellion against Spanish dominion, to gain freedom for your people, and therefore starting the Eighty Years' War. Your actions were all aimed to create one of Europe's first modern republics, the Seven United Provinces. The rebellion was the meaning of your very life and death, as it was also the cause of your assassination in 1584. But your death has given even more pride and courage to your people, to fight for liberty against any oppressors. Carved in history as the 'Father of the Fatherland', your name is a symbol of Dutch independence for eternity.
startIntroPart2: Brave Prince, your people ask for your wisdom to gain its freedom once more, and to illuminate the world with progressive and modern ideas. Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: As much as I despise war, I consider it a, hahaha, contribution to the common cause to erase your existence.
attacked: You call yourself an exalted ruler, but I see nothing more than a smartly dressed barbarian!
defeated: My God, be merciful to my soul. My God, feel pity for this... my poor people!
introduction: I am William of Orange, stadtholder of The Netherlands. Did you need anything? I still have a lot to do.
tradeRequest: I believe I have something that may be of some importance to you.
uniques: Retain [50]% of the happiness from a luxury after the last copy has been traded away

name: Iroquois
startIntroPart1: Greetings, noble Hiawatha, leader of the mighty Iroquois nations! Your people lived near the great and holy lake Ontario since the ancient ages, on a land that will be later known as New York city. Long ago, the five peoples of Seneca, Onondaga, Mohawks, Cayugas and Oneida became one nation, the Haudenosaunee, the Iroquois. Although not having a written language, the wise Iroquois created the Great Law of Peace, which can be considered the first established constitution. For decades, your people fought powerful enemies, such as the Huron, and then the French and English colonists. With less warriors and inferior weaponry, the Iroquois still survived and walk on the path of peace and harmony, until their way of living faded away under the crush of the newborn United States nation.
startIntroPart2: Great Sachem Hiawatha, do you hear the complaints of your people? Can you light the path leading to the ancient Iroquois union? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: You are a plague upon Mother Earth! Prepare for battle!
attacked: You evil creature! My braves will slaughter you!
defeated: You have defeated us... but our spirits will never be vanquished! We shall return!
introduction: Greetings, stranger. I am Hiawatha, speaker for the Iroquois. We seek peace with all, but we do not shrink from war.
tradeRequest: Does this trade work for you, my friend?
uniques: All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
[+1 Happiness] per [3] social policies adopted <in [in all cities] cities>
[10]% Food is carried over after population increases [in all cities]
[+1 Gold, +2 Production, +1 Culture] in cities on [Forrest] tiles

name: Egypt
startIntroPart1: O great Ramesses, Pharaoh of Egypt, bright as the Sun and mighty as the Nile! Lord of all living things, you lead the greatest of all civilizations, which has gifted the world with writing, advanced mathematics, sculpture, and architecture. Egyptian monuments and culture will continue to amaze the world for thousands of years.
startIntroPart2: Mighty and eternal Ramesses, Egypt lasted for millenia, whereas other civilisations disappeared into dust after a few centuries. Amun-Ra blesses you again to lead Egypt and its people on the path of light. Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: You are but a pest on this Earth, prepare to be eliminated!
attacked: You are a fool who evokes pity. You have brought my hostility upon yourself and your repulsive civilization!
defeated: Strike me down and my soul will torment yours forever, you have won nothing.
introduction: Greetings, I am Ramesses the god. I am the living embodiment of Egypt, mother and father of all civilizations.
tradeRequest: Generous Egypt makes you this offer.
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
[+2 Production] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+1 Gold, +2 Food] from every [Flood Plain, River]

name: Persia
startIntroPart1: Great King Darius of Persia, the heaven casts its light upon you! Persian people are strong and wise, as their leader. In old ages, the great Persian king Cyrus fought back the mighty Median empire and finally destroyed the Medes in 550 BC. Cunning diplomacy and military achievements helped then to conquer the wealthy Lydia and the powerful Babylon, Cyrus' son conquering the eternal Egypt some years later. At the height of its power, the Persian Empire reached the shores of Macedonia, at the very door of the upstart Greek city-states. Persia would have prospered for centuries if Alexander of Macedon hadn't brutally destroyed the great empire in one violent strike.
startIntroPart2: King Darius, the people of Persia await, longing for its past glory and power! Persia of the Immortals must reborn, to punish its foes and rebuild the gleaming Persepolis! Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Your continue existence is an embarrassment to all leaders everywhere! You must be destroyed!
attacked: Curse you! You are beneath me, son of a donkey driver! I will crush you!
defeated: You mongrel! Cursed be you! The world will long lament your heinous crime!
introduction: Peace be on you! I am Darius, the great and outstanding king of kings of great Persia... but I suppose you knew that.
tradeRequest: In my endless magnanimity, I am making you this offer. You agree, of course?
uniques: Empire enters golden age <upon conquering a city>
[-15]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: Mongolia
startIntroPart1: O great Temuujin, immortal leader of the mighty Mongol Empire! Your name alone was enough to make cities crumble, and the sound of the mighty Mongol cavalry to make your enemies flee! O Great Khan! Once Northern Asia united into a mighty people, producing one of the greatest armies the world has ever known, your skillful mounted archers conquered in only a few years, most of China, Eastern Asia, and even reached the gates of Europe at the West. With cunning diplomacy and brilliant warfare, you swept your enemies one after another, creating the greatest empire ever seen, reducing Roman or Greek conquests to minor achievements.
startIntroPart2: Divine Temuujin, battles and conquests run through the veins of the Mongols. Are you ready to shatter the will of your enemies? Will your cavalry ride in the steppes once again and strike as lightning and thunder? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: You stand in the way of my armies. Let us solve this like warriors!
attacked: No more words. Today, Mongolia charges toward your defeat.
defeated: You have hobbled the Mongolian clans. My respect for you nearly matches the loathing. I am waiting for my execution.
introduction: I am Temuujin, conqueror of cities and countries. Before me lie future Mongolian lands. Behind me is the only cavalry that matters.
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, but we hope you take this rare opportunity we give you.
uniques: New [Mounted] units start with [10] Experience [in all cities]
When defeating a [Mounted] unit, earn [5] Gold and recruit it <with [50]% chance>

name: The Huns
startIntroPart1: Great Attila, mighty warrior and leader of the Hunnic empire, your men bow down before you. During the 5th century, you and your brother Bleda have conquered many lands, forged a mighty empire and commanded the most powerful and frightening force of antiquity. You inspired fear to the Roman Emperors themselves, who called you 'Flagellum Dei', the 'Scourge of God', as you took kingdom after kingdom in the Balkans, invaded Eastern Roman Empire, into Gaul and Northern Italy, and planned to conquer Rome itself. Your empire didn't survive long after your death, but your name and your legend have, for millenia to come.
startIntroPart2: Fearsome General, your mighty hordes are at your command, waiting to crush your foes once again and to conquer all the riches the world has to offer! Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: I grow tired of this throne. I think I should like to have yours instead.
defeated: My people will mourn me not with tears, but with human blood.
attacked: Now what is this?! You ask me to add your riches to my great avails. The invitation is accepted.
introduction: You are in the presence of Attila, scourge of Rome. Do not let hubris be your downfall as well.
tradeRequest: This is better than you deserve, but let it not be said that I am an unfair man.
uniques: Cities are razed [3] times as fast
"Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game
Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
When conquering an encampment, earn [30] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit
When defeating a [Barbarian] unit, earn [5] Gold and recruit it
[+15]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: Gran Colombia
startIntroPart1: Greetings, noble leader. I am Simón Bolívar, known as El Libertador, the liberator of South America. With courage and unwavering resolve, I led the charge for independence across vast lands, uniting people under the banner of freedom. Today, we stand on the threshold of greatness once more, ready to forge a new destiny for Gran Colombia.
startIntroPart2: In this journey, we shall face many challenges, from the rugged Andes to the lush plains and dense jungles. Our strength lies in unity, resilience, and the unwavering spirit of our people. Together, we will build a prosperous and powerful nation, where liberty and justice reign supreme. Let us march forward, with the vision of a unified and free South America guiding our every step. ¡Viva Gran Colombia!
declaringWar: Your tyranny, if unchecked, dooms the world to darkness, and for this reason I must declare war on you.
attacked: Recourse to war is regrettable, but necessary, when dealing with vipers like you.
defeated: Everything I have done, I did for the nation of Gran Colombia. I remain a patriot to the very end.
introduction: I, President Simón Bolívar, welcome you to Gran Colombia.
tradeRequest: I send to you a delegation of my finest horsemen. Will you let them in?
uniques: [+100]% XP gained from combat <for [Military] units> <during a Golden Age>
[+1] Happiness from each type of luxury resource
[+2 Gold, +2 Food] from [Plantation] tiles [in all cities]
Rebel units may spawn <when at war>

name: Cherokee
startIntroPart1: Osiyo, noble leader. I am Pathkiller, chief of the Cherokee. Our roots run deep in these lands, nurtured by the wisdom of our ancestors and the spirit of our people.
startIntroPart2: Together, we will walk the path of harmony and strength, embracing the future while honoring our sacred traditions. Our warriors are fierce, our culture rich, and our resolve unbreakable. Let us guide the Cherokee to a new dawn, where our legacy will shine brightly for all time.
declaringWar: The spirit of the Cherokee rises against your aggression. Prepare for our fierce resistance.
attacked: You strike at the heart of the Cherokee? We will defend our sacred land with every breath.
defeated: Though our bodies may fall, the spirit of the Cherokee will endure through the ages.
introduction: I am Pathkiller, chief of the Cherokee. Our people are the keepers of the land, wise and resilient.
neutralHello: Greetings. The Cherokee walk the path of peace and wisdom.
hateHello: Your actions have betrayed our trust. The Cherokee will not forget this.
tradeRequest: The Cherokee are open to fair trade. What do you bring to the table?
uniques: [+2 Faith, +2 Food] from [Forest] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Happiness, +2 Production, +1 Food] from each Trade Route
When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [+3]% boost to great person generation
[+25]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]

name: Austria
startIntroPart1: Noble and pious Queen Maria Theresa, Holy Roman Empress and sovereign of Austria, the people revere your grace. After the death of your father King Charles VI, you inherited the throne of Austria during difficult economic and military times. But you used your wisdom and unflinching determination to fend off your foes and resolve any obstacles to stability and prosperity. With your husband Francis Stephen at your side as co-ruler, you assured your place as Empress of the Holy Roman Empire. During your reign, you reformed Austria in several domains, as you gifted it with a powerful army, a stable economic model, and an improved educational system.
startIntroPart2: O Great Queen, proud and dignified, by the will of God and the Divine right, can you reach the height of prosperity and splendor the kingdom of Austria deserves? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Shame that it has come this far. But ye wished it so. Next time, be so good, choose your words more wisely.
attacked: What a fool ye are! Ye will end swiftly and miserably.
defeated: The world is pitiful! There's no beauty in it, no wisdom. I am almost glad to go.
introduction: The archduchess of Austria welcomes your Eminence to... Oh let's get this over with! I have a luncheon at four o'clock.
tradeRequest: I see you admire my new damask. Nobody should say that I am an unjust woman. Let's reach an agreement!
uniques: Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [5] turns.
[+20]% Happiness from luxury resources gifted by City-States
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [10]
Gain [15] Influence with a [Melee] gift to a City-State
[+2 Production] [in all cities] <starting from the [Industrial era]>
[+10]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when at war> <for [25] turns>

name: Knights Templar
startIntroPart1: I am Hugues de Payens, the first Grand Master of the Knights Templar. Our order stands resolute in our sacred mission.
startIntroPart2: We are the shield and sword of Christendom, sworn to protect the faithful and uphold divine justice.
declaringWar: By the Holy Cross, we shall cleanse the land of your heresy!
attacked: Your aggression will be met with the full might of the Templars!
defeated: Though we fall, our cause remains eternal. Deus vult.
introduction: I am Hugues de Payens, Grand Master of the Knights Templar. Our faith and steel are unbreakable.
neutralHello: Blessings upon you. How may we serve the greater good today?
hateHello: Your actions have tested our patience. We are prepared for righteous retribution.
tradeRequest: A fair exchange can strengthen our mutual interests. What do you propose?
uniques: Empire enters golden age <upon founding a Religion>

name: Safavid Dynasty
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the grand court of Shah Abbas the Great, ruler of the magnificent Safavid Dynasty. Under my reign, Iran has blossomed into a land of splendor and might.
startIntroPart2: Let us embark on a journey of cultural brilliance and military prowess. The world shall marvel at the wonders of Isfahan and the strength of our empire.
declaringWar: You have chosen to face the wrath of Shah Abbas and the mighty Safavid warriors? Prepare for a battle you'll not soon forget!
attacked: Your aggression is noted, but the spirit of Iran is unbreakable. We shall rise from the ashes and retaliate with ferocity!
defeated: Though I step back today, the legacy of Abbas the Great and the Safavid Dynasty will endure. This is not the end, but a new beginning.
introduction: I am Shah Abbas the Great, the beacon of Iran's cultural and military brilliance. Our empire thrives with art, trade, and unmatched warriors.
neutralHello: Greetings from the illustrious Safavid Empire. May our dealings be as fruitful as the bazaars of Isfahan.
hateHello: Your presence is like a thorn in the silk of our empire. Tread carefully, for Shah Abbas's patience is wearing thin.
tradeRequest: The finest treasures of Iran are at your disposal. Let us trade and forge a path to mutual prosperity.
uniques: [+3 Gold, +1 Happiness, +2 Culture] from all [World] buildings
[+3 Gold, +1 Happiness, +2 Culture] from all [National] buildings
[+10]% Production when constructing [World] buildings [in all cities]
[+10]% Production when constructing [National] buildings [in all cities]
[+1 Gold, +2 Faith] <in cities following our religion>

name: Venice
startIntroPart1: Salutations, I am Doge Enrico Dandolo of the illustrious Republic of Venice. Though I rose to power in the twilight of my years, age has not dulled my wit nor my ambition. Amidst the tumultuous tides of instability, I steered Venice through the storm with unmatched cunning. By aligning with the Fourth Crusade, I deftly reclaimed our lost territories, using the Crusaders as pawns in our grand game. The sacking of Constantinople was not merely a victory but a masterstroke that expanded Venetian influence and secured my legacy for eternity.
startIntroPart2: Now, the Serenissima calls upon me once more to lead her to new heights. Will I craft a legacy of unrivaled trade, or shall I wield diplomacy to subdue our foes? Join me, as we weave the tapestry of a civilization destined to endure the ages.
declaringWar: Your time is up, my adversary. Venice will triumph!
attacked: Ah, you reveal your hand too soon, my rival!
defeated: A miscalculation, but Venice will rise again.
introduction: Welcome to Venice, the jewel of the Adriatic. I am Doge Enrico Dandolo.
neutralHello: Greetings from the heart of Venetian splendor.
hateHello: You dare approach me? State your business quickly.
tradeRequest: Consider this offer carefully; it won't stand for long.
uniques: Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [+35]% more Influence
[-15]% Production when constructing [Land] units [in all cities]

name: The Maya
startIntroPart1: Kneel before King Pacal the Great, son of the gods and protector of the Palenque domain! After your kingdom has been harassed for years by neighboring rivals, you struck back at the enemies of your people, defeating each of them and sacrificing their leaders as a retribution to the insults made to your ancestors. Your wisdom and hard will not only restored the glory of Palenque, but turned it into a magnificient city, as your people built the greatest monuments and architecture the world has ever known.
startIntroPart2: Absolute King, your people need you to save the great Mayan culture and knowledge. Will you be able to read the movement of the stars, and find in the heavens the power to repel any foes? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: A sacrifice unlike all others must be made!
attacked: Muahahahahahaha!
defeated: Today comes a great searing pain. With you comes the path to the black storm.
introduction: Greetings, wayward one. I am known as Pacal.
tradeRequest: Friend, I believe I may have found a way to save us all! Look, look and accept my offering!
neutralHello: A fine day, it helps you.
uniques: Receive a free Great Person at the end of every [Maya Long Count calendar cycle] (every 394 years), after researching [Theology]. Each bonus person can only be chosen once.
Once The Long Count activates, the year on the world screen displays as the traditional Mayan Long Count.
Free Social Policy <every [100] turns> <(modified by game speed)>
Free Technology] <every [110] turns> <(modified by game speed)>
[-1 Food, -1 Production] from [Lumber mill] tiles [in all cities]
